name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Desktop Application Developer with 8 years of expertise in C++, **Qt**, **QML**, Ruby, and Python. Proficient in designing and implementing **MVC**, **MVVM**, and **MVP** architectural patterns to create robust and user-friendly desktop applications. Well-versed in Test-Driven Development (TDD), Behavior-Driven Development (BDD), and automated testing methodologies, ensuring high code quality and thread-safe code practices.
Demonstrated ability to work in Agile environments using **Scrum** and **Kanban** methodologies, fostering strong collaboration and efficient project delivery. Adept at developing software solutions with an emphasis on network security, software security, and comprehensive technical documentation. 
With a solid foundation in problem solving and user experience principles, I have successfully led projects in the healthcare and financial sectors, integrating effective communication skills to bridge technical and non-technical stakeholders.
